title: dinam iru vELaiyum
sahitya:
dinam iru vELaiyum Om shuddha shaktiyenrE dhyAnam sheidAlE pOdum


anupallavi

  manadin cETTai oDungi maTra ninavaDangi


caraNam 1    Om enum paramporuL nAma rUpam aTradu oppuyarvillAda tarpparam shuDaradu
nAm enum poruLadu nAnA vikAramillA nalla spaTikam pOnra tulyajnAnamenrE
    caraNam 2    sAdhu sangattAlum sAtvika uNavAlum sanmArga naDaiyAlum sadguru paNiyAlum
bhEdamil matiyAlum vAdamil arivAlum peria paraporuLait-turiya nilaiyinilE
